
## Crop information



```{r}

```

## Nitrogen staus

```{r}

```



## Soil information 


```{r}

```

```{r, fig.height=12, fig.width=10, dpi=300}
library(cowplot)

plot_grid(params$p_N_uptake, params$p_N_supply, align = "v", ncol = 1)
```
